meanings.definition: The quality of being tacky or tasteless.
meanings.sent1: The tackinesses of the decorations made the room look messy.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit was full of tackinesses, with clashing colors and loud patterns.
meanings.sent3: The tackinesses of the party favors made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The tackinesses of the painting screamed for attention in the gallery.
meanings.sent5: The tackinesses of the design were impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: The state of being cheap or gaudy in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The tackinesses of the costume jewelry were evident under the bright lights.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with tackinesses, from the plastic furniture to the fake flowers.
meanings.sent3: The tackinesses of the souvenir shop made it a popular spot for tourists.
meanings.sent4: Her tackinesses shone through in her love for glittery accessories.
meanings.sent5: The tackinesses of the party theme clashed with the elegant setting.
